channel.title: PHP Resources
channel.description:
I do not take credit for these tutorials, and they are for the sole purpose of learning.
1. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/ifelse.php]Introduction[/url] 2. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/install.php]Installation[/url] 3. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/syntax.php]Syntax[/url] 4. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/variable.php]Variables[/url] 5. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/echo.php]Echo[/url] 6. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/strings.php]Strings[/url] 7. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/operators.php]Operators[/url] 8. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/comment.php]Comments[/url] 9. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/include.php]Include File[/url] 10. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/require.php]Require vs Include[/url] 11. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/if.php]If Statement[/url] 12. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/ifelse.php]If/Else Conditional Statement[/url] 13. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/elseif.php]Else/If Statements[/url] 14. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/switch.php]Switch[/url] 15. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/forms.php]Forms[/url] 16. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/phpfunctions.php]Functions[/url] 17. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/arrays.php]Arrays[/url] 18. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/whileloop.php]While Loop[/url] 19. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/forloop.php]For Loop[/url] 20. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/foreach.php]For Each Loop[/url] 21. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/dowhile.php]Do While Loop[/url] 22. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/postget.php]Post and Get[/url] 23. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/php-magic-quotes.php]Magic Quotes[/url] 24. [url=http://www.tizag.com/phpT/php-htmlentities.php]Htmlentities Function[/url]
[b][size=4]Application design[/size][/b]
[b]General:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.omg.org/]The Object Management Group (OMG)[/url] [*][url=http://devzone.zend.com/public/view]Zend Developer Zone[/url] [*][url=http://devzone.zend.com/node/view/id/63]ZF: Enabling Hierarchical URI[/url] [*][url=http://www.sitepoint.com/article/development-guide-success]Web Application Development - A Guide to Success[/url] [*][url=http://searchopensource.techtarget.com/searchEnterpriseLinux/downloads/phphacks51-56.pdf]PHP Hacks Chapter 6: Application Design[/url] [*][url=http://www.lbsharp.com/weblog/articles/php_design1.html]PHP Application Framework Design Tutorial[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpriot.com/d/articles/php/application-design/index.html]PHP Riot's Application Design Section[/url] [*][url=http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/Unicode.html]The Absolute Minimum Every Software Developer Absolutely, Positively Must Know About Unicode and Character Sets (No Excuses!)[/url][/ul]
[b]Design strategies:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.ftponline.com/javapro/2003_11/magazine/features/jbyassee/]Philosophy of Interface-Driven Design[/url] [*][url=http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=5B2A84D4-22A5-43E9-B5F9-42ED0A0779D6&displaylang=en]Jimmy Nilsson on Domain Driven Design[/url] [*][url=http://patternshare.org/default.aspx/Home.DDD.HomePage]Domain-Driven Design patterns[/url][/ul]
[ul][*][url=http://www.agiledata.org/essays/tdd.html]Introduction to Test Driven Design[/url][/ul]
[b]Unified Modeling Language:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.uml.org/]UML Homepage[/url] [*][url=http://www-306.ibm.com/software/rational/uml/]IBM UML Resource Center[/url] [*][url=http://umlcenter.visual-paradigm.com/]Visual Paradigm UML Resources Center[/url] [*][url=http://www.visualcase.com/tutorials/uml-tutorial.htm]Visual Case Tool - UML Tutorial[/url] [*][url=http://dn.codegear.com/article/31863#classdiagrams]Practical UMLâ„¢: A Hands-On Introduction for Developers[/url] [*][url=http://www.prestwood.com/aspsuite/kb/document_view.asp?qid=100035]OO/UML: Aggregation versus Composition[/url][/ul]
[b]UML software:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.visual-paradigm.com/product/vpuml/]Visual Paradigm for UML Community Edition[/url] [*][url=http://uml.sourceforge.net/index.php]Umbrello UML Modeller[/url] [*][url=http://argouml.tigris.org/]ArgoUML[/url] [*][url=http://horstmann.com/violet/]Violet UML editor[/url] [*][url=http://www.waterproof.fr/products/xmi2php/]XMI to PHP[/url] [*][url=http://tech.motion-twin.com/php_php2xmi.html]PHP to XMI[/url][/ul]
[b]PHP5 related:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.zend.com/php/design/patterns1.php]PHP 5 and Design Patterns: An Introduction[/url] [*][url=http://www.phptr.com/articles/article.asp?p=346958&seqNum=1&rl=1]PHP 5 Advanced OOP and Design Patterns[/url] [*][url=http://www.developer.com/lang/php/article.php/10941_3608266_1]PHP 5 OOP: Delegation and Custom Exceptions[/url] [*] [url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/ObjectOriented-Programming-Through-Design-Patterns/]Sams: Object-Oriented Programming Through Design Patterns[/url]
[*][url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/Design-Patterns-and-PHP-5/]Sams: Design Patterns and PHP 5 [/url] [*] [url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/Polymorphism-Design-Patterns-and-PHP-Programming/]Sams: Polymorphism, Design Patterns, and PHP Programming[/url]
[*] [url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/Overloading-and-ObjectOriented-Programming-with-PHP-5/]Sams: Overloading and Object-Oriented Programming with PHP 5 [/url]
[*][url=http://nl3.php.net/spl]Standard PHP Library (SPL) Functions[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpriot.com/d/articles/php/oop/oop-with-spl-php-5-1/]Advanced OOP with SPL in PHP 5[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpit.net/article/simple-mvc-php5/]Building a simple MVC system with PHP5[/url] [*] [url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/Controlling-Online-Forms-with-Builder-Objects-in-PHP-5/]Controlling Online Forms with Builder Objects in PHP 5[/url][/ul]
[b]MVC:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://planetmvc.org/cakephp/]Planet MVC[/url] [*] [url=http://www.thinkingphp.org/2006/09/25/learning-from-the-cakephp-source-code-part-i/]Learning from the CakePHP source code - Part I[/url]
[*][url=http://www.onlamp.com/pub/a/php/2005/09/15/mvc_intro.html?page=1]Understanding MVC in PHP[/url] [*][url=http://www.enode.com/x/markup/tutorial/mvc.html]Model View Controller Illustrated[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpwact.org/pattern/model_view_controller]Model View Controller Overview[/url] [*][url=http://nooranch.com/synaesmedia/wiki/wiki.cgi?ModelViewController]The sad story of Model View Controller[/url] [*][url=http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/dnpatterns/html/DesMVC.asp]Yes, it's from Microsoft, but hey.. [/url][/ul]
[b]Design Patterns:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://patternshare.org/]patternshare.org[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/hello_world_in_patterns]Hello World in Patterns[/url] [*][url=http://www.patternsforphp.com/index.php?title=Main_Page]Patterns for PHP[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpit.net/article/using-globals-php/1/]Registry Pattern[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/singleton_pattern]Singleton Pattern[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/strategy_pattern]Strategy Patterns[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/observer_pattern]Observer Pattern[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/the_factory_method]Factory Method[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/adapters_and_proxy_patterns]Adapters and proxy patterns[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/the_iterator_pattern]Iterator Pattern[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/the_decorator_pattern_redecorated]Decorator Pattern[/url] [*][url=http://www.phppatterns.com/docs/design/the_command_pattern]Command Pattern[/url][/ul]
[b]Custom template engines:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.sitepoint.com/article/beyond-template-engine]Beyond The Template Engine[/url] [*][url=http://www.codingforums.com/showthread.php?t=76691]CodingForums.com: Modular DOMDocument template engine[/url] [*][url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/Using-a-Template-Processor-Class-in-PHP-5/]Using a Template Processor Class in PHP 5 [/url][/ul]
[b]Database design:[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.wrox.com/WileyCDA/Section/id-129433.html]Database Design Basics[/url] [*][url=http://dev.mysql.com/tech-resources/articles/intro-to-normalization.html]An Introduction to Database Normalization[/url] [*][url=http://www.sitepoint.com/article/database-design-management]Concepts of Database Design and Management[/url][/ul]
[b][size=4]Frameworks:[/size][/b]
[ul][*][url=http://www.phpwact.org/php/mvc_frameworks]PHP MVC Frameworks[/url] [*][url=http://ajaxpatterns.org/PHP_Ajax_Frameworks]PHP Ajax Frameworks[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpclasses.org/blog/post/52-Recommended-PHP-frameworks.html]Manual Lemos' Recommended Frameworks[/url] [*][url=http://www.phpit.net/article/ten-different-php-frameworks/]Taking a look at ten different PHP frameworks[/url][/ul]
[b][size=4]Performance and security[/size][/b]
[b]PHP[/b]
[ul][*] [url=http://www.devshed.com/c/a/PHP/Output-Caching-with-PHP/]Simple ouput caching tutorial[/url]
[*][url=http://www.zend.com/zend/art/scriptcaching.php]More simple ouput caching[/url] [*][url=http://www.badpenguin.org/docs/php-cache.html]Client/proxy caching tutorial[/url] [*][url=http://www.php-accelerator.co.uk/]PHP Accelerator[/url] [*][url=http://turck-mmcache.sourceforge.net/]Turck MMCache[/url] [*][url=http://phpsec.org/projects/guide/]PHP Security Guide[/url] [*][url=http://phplens.com/lens/php-book/optimizing-debugging-php.php]PHP optimization tips[/url] [*][url=http://www.ister.org/code/article/en/phpbench51.xhtml]Performance of the PHP5.1 Object Model Compared to PHP4[/url] [*][url=http://www.sitepoint.com/print/php-security-blunders]Top 7 PHP Security Blunders[/url][/ul]
[b]MySQL[/b]
[ul][*][url=http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/optimization.html]MySQL Optimization[/url] [*][url=http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/security.html]MySQL General Security Issues[/url][/ul]

item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Yummy Cakes, post:1, topic:238002”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=313886.msg2497556#msg2497556 date=1224469564]

offtopic; you’re ‘noobcleaner’ looks like an edited version of k00dr’s. id suggest changing it before you get your ass flamed. + why do you always leech shit from other people and put it as your own. for example, theanimus.no-ip.org’s hiscore shit. i know the owner of that, and they have verified they are not you.
[/quote]You should learn grammar before you get flamed.

Oh wait…

pwnd_ getting all emo? cut somewhere else[/quote]How many other accounts do you have, retard?

item.title: PHP Resources
item.dc:creator: @A_S_C_I_I A S C I I
item.description:
@A_S_C_I_I wrote:

I do not take credit for these tutorials, and they are for the sole purpose of learning.

  1. Introduction
  2. Installation
  3. Syntax
  4. Variables
  5. Echo
  6. Strings
  7. Operators
  8. Comments
  9. Include File
  10. Require vs Include
  11. If Statement
  12. If/Else Conditional Statement
  13. Else/If Statements
  14. Switch
  15. Forms
  16. Functions
  17. Arrays
  18. While Loop
  19. For Loop
  20. For Each Loop
  21. Do While Loop
  22. Post and Get
  23. Magic Quotes
  24. Htmlentities Function

[size=4]Application design[/size]

General:

[ul][]The Object Management Group (OMG)
[]Zend Developer Zone
[]ZF: Enabling Hierarchical URI
[]Web Application Development - A Guide to Success
[]PHP Hacks Chapter 6: Application Design
[]PHP Application Framework Design Tutorial
[]PHP Riot’s Application Design Section
[]The Absolute Minimum Every Software Developer Absolutely, Positively Must Know About Unicode and Character Sets (No Excuses!)[/ul]

Design strategies:

[ul][]Philosophy of Interface-Driven Design
[]Jimmy Nilsson on Domain Driven Design
[*]Domain-Driven Design patterns[/ul]

[ul][*]Introduction to Test Driven Design[/ul]

Unified Modeling Language:

[ul][]UML Homepage
[]IBM UML Resource Center
[]Visual Paradigm UML Resources Center
[]Visual Case Tool - UML Tutorial
[]Practical UMLâ„¢: A Hands-On Introduction for Developers
[]OO/UML: Aggregation versus Composition[/ul]

UML software:

[ul][]Visual Paradigm for UML Community Edition
[]Umbrello UML Modeller
[]ArgoUML
[]Violet UML editor
[]XMI to PHP
[]PHP to XMI[/ul]

PHP5 related:

[ul][]PHP 5 and Design Patterns: An Introduction
[]PHP 5 Advanced OOP and Design Patterns
[]PHP 5 OOP: Delegation and Custom Exceptions
[]
Sams: Object-Oriented Programming Through Design Patterns

[]Sams: Design Patterns and PHP 5
[]
Sams: Polymorphism, Design Patterns, and PHP Programming

[*]
Sams: Overloading and Object-Oriented Programming with PHP 5

[]Standard PHP Library (SPL) Functions
[]Advanced OOP with SPL in PHP 5
[]Building a simple MVC system with PHP5
[]
Controlling Online Forms with Builder Objects in PHP 5[/ul]

MVC:

[ul][]Planet MVC
[]
Learning from the CakePHP source code - Part I

[]Understanding MVC in PHP
[]Model View Controller Illustrated
[]Model View Controller Overview
[]The sad story of Model View Controller
[*]Yes, it’s from Microsoft, but hey… [/ul]

Design Patterns:

[ul][]patternshare.org
[]Hello World in Patterns
[]Patterns for PHP
[]Registry Pattern
[]Singleton Pattern
[]Strategy Patterns
[]Observer Pattern
[]Factory Method
[]Adapters and proxy patterns
[]Iterator Pattern
[]Decorator Pattern
[]Command Pattern[/ul]

Custom template engines:

[ul][]Beyond The Template Engine
[]CodingForums.com: Modular DOMDocument template engine
[*]Using a Template Processor Class in PHP 5 [/ul]

Database design:

[ul][]Database Design Basics
[]An Introduction to Database Normalization
[*]Concepts of Database Design and Management[/ul]

[size=4]Frameworks:[/size]

[ul][]PHP MVC Frameworks
[]PHP Ajax Frameworks
[]Manual Lemos’ Recommended Frameworks
[]Taking a look at ten different PHP frameworks[/ul]

[size=4]Performance and security[/size]

PHP

[ul][*]
Simple ouput caching tutorial

[]More simple ouput caching
[]Client/proxy caching tutorial
[]PHP Accelerator
[]Turck MMCache
[]PHP Security Guide
[]PHP optimization tips
[]Performance of the PHP5.1 Object Model Compared to PHP4
[]Top 7 PHP Security Blunders[/ul]

MySQL

[ul][]MySQL Optimization
[]MySQL General Security Issues[/ul]
